SEARCH
Module fr.cyu
Package fr.cyu.chromatynk.parsing

Class ParsingIterator<T>

java.lang.Object
fr.cyu.chromatynk.parsing.ParsingIterator<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the elements of the iterated input
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterator<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
RangedParsingIterator
public class ParsingIterator<T> extends Object implements Iterator<T>
A copyable iterator which tracks its cursor position in line and column.

  • Constructor Details

    • ParsingIterator

      public ParsingIterator(List<T> input, int cursor, Position position, Predicate<T> whitespace, Predicate<T> lineSeparator)
      Create a new ParsingIterator.
      Parameters:
      input - the input to iterate over
      cursor - the starting index of the iterator
      position - the starting 2D position (column and row) of the iterator
      whitespace - the predicate checking if an input element is a whitespace
      lineSeparator - the predicate checking if an input element is a line break

    • ParsingIterator

      public ParsingIterator(List<T> input)
      Create a new ParsingIterator from an input, starting at index 0, position (0,0) and with no whitespace/line break check.
      Parameters:
      input - the input to iterate over

      public void handleWhitespaces()

    • nextKeepWhitespaces

      public T nextKeepWhitespaces()
      Like next() but without skipping whitespaces/line breaks.
      Returns:
      the next element to be processed, even if it is a whitespace or a line break

      public T next()
      Specified by:

    • copy

      public ParsingIterator<T> copy()
      Copy this ParsingIterator.

    • fromString

      public static ParsingIterator<Character> fromString(String input)
      Create a new ParsingIterator from a String input.
      Parameters:
      input - the textual input to iterate over
      Returns:
      a new ParsingIterator reading the characters of the passed input, using LF/CLRF as line breaks and Character.isWhitespace(char) for whitespaces

    • of

      @SafeVarargs public static <T> ParsingIterator<T> of(T... values)
      Vararg version of ParsingIterator(List).
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the passed values
      Parameters:
      values - the elements to iterate over
      Returns:
      a new ParsingIterator iterating over the given values
